title: Drawing, "Desk: Centered Seating, Three Drawer Stack Left and Right with Vertical, Centered, Rectangular Hardware", 1930s
markings: Stamped in black ink at center right, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite at upper left. Inscribed in graphite at lower left, Fig. AMERICAN WALNUT OR/ [?] MAHOGANY OR [Lower edge is cut off.] Inscribed in red color pencil in lower right hand corner, P

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk: Centered Seating, Three Drawer Stack Left and Right with Vertical, Centered, Rectangular Hardware", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite, red color pencil. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1777.
